title: Cap vs Crossbones! Chris Evans, Frank Grillo film action scenes at Mar
title_page: Cap vs Crossbones! Chris Evans, Frank Grillo film action scenes at Mar
text:
The Marvel threequel "Captain America: Civil War" has been filming in downtown Atlanta for several days now.
A whole family of superheroes! Fernando Lamb and his wife Adriana Plasencia with their kids Fernando, 6, and Vanessa, 4.
Fernando Lamb and his wife Adriana Plasencia took their kids Fernando, 6, and Vanessa, 4, to check out the set and sent us these great photos showing Chris Evans and Frank Grillo in action as Captain America and his nemesis Crossbones. (In some of the shots Evans' stunt double Sam Hargrave is actually taking the blows).
